channel.title: Radio Frequency Identification on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Radio Frequency Identification on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Terso Solutions Logo Terso Solutions, Inc., located in Madison, Wisconsin, USA, is the developer and distributor of an automated system for storage and distribution of high value research reagents and medical supplies. Terso first developed a reagent stocking system, which uses RAIN radio frequency identification tags along with secure access control, linked to the internet. These combined technologies allow inventory to be securely tracked and managed remotely. Source
You can download theTerso Solutionslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Terso Solutions
item.description: Terso Solutions, Inc., located in Madison, Wisconsin, USA, is the developer and distributor of an automated system for storage and distribution of high value research reagents and medical supplies. Terso first developed a reagent stocking system, which uses RAIN radio frequency identification tags along with secure access control, linked to the internet. These combined technologies allow inventory to be securely tracked and managed remotely. Source
